NUCAMP SUPLEMENTAL EXCERCISES

(Additional excercises to help students with Saturday Workshops)

Instructions for use:

1. Select section:

Select the appropriate section you are in after you've read the directions:

  • HTML/CSS/JS
  • BOOTSTRAP
  • REACT
  • REACT NATIVE
  • NODE
  • SQL
  • PYTHON

2. Read and review the excercise:

Navigate to the appropriate week in your code and read through the instructions for the excercise.

3. Attempt the excercise:

Modify the code on your own without looking at any solutions. When you are ready check the live site to see if your changes worked!

4. Review help code for solution:

Take a look at the solution to see if that helps you understand where you went wrong. If not reach out to your channel/cohort/instructor!
